revised_title: Oxidation Products of Hydrocarbons: Research on the Series CnH2n+2
tldr: The author investigates the oxidation products of hydrocarbons in the series CnH2n+2, focusing on the oxidation of hexylhydride, octylhydride, and diamyl. The main products include succinic acid, fatty acids, and nitriles. The study provides insights into the chemical reactions and properties of these compounds.
